Articles.Content:
![BhdQ2jb.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/BhdQ2jb.jpg)

+ Reputation for whomever comes up with the best caption for this screenshot. Or anyone who tells how to post the screenshot instead of just a link to it.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-16T03:23:36Z" title="05/16/2015 03:23  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 16, 2015</time> by DarkGravity**
*The only way to play KSP, am I right?*

> 
> *The only way to play KSP, am I right?*

i don't disagree

well, the only caption I can think of isn't appropriate for this forum.

re displaying images, use an image tag like this (with the url pointing to an image, not an album)

[noparse]![u2TzTNU.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/u2TzTNU.jpg)[/noparse]

You can add an imgur album like this;

[noparse]

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/Y7pV4)

[/noparse]
On imgur just click on your image and on the right it gives you the link and tag that you need to use, select 1 of the last two (BBCode or Linked BBCode)

fixed

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-16T03:24:29Z" title="05/16/2015 03:24  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 16, 2015</time> by DarkGravity**
Caption: *Zoinks! You've taken a wrong turn!*

"We obviously have too much weight in the nose. CHUG THE BEER NOW!"

This will, of course, not affect the balance of the ship due to conservation of mass. But if you've already been drinking, it should seem like a good idea ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Sorry guys, we don't allow drugs and or Alcohol usage to be discussed or implied..
